item.title: Cultur
item.team: Design:Kaili Miyamoto;Front-End:E.A.Taylor;Back-End:Rama Mcintosh,Caleb Haye;Business Development:Jan Uetz Ayacaba Ondo,Jonny Mack,Mike Hegazy
item.desc: Cultur is your Ultimate Event Resource, to get what you need when you want it. Find any activity/event going on around you at any time and any place. See if your friends or people with like interests will be there.
item.technotes: Cultur has a simple jquery mobile interface for navigating events crawled by a Ruby on Rails crawler
